data:item.name: FRDM-STBA-A8967
data:item.display_title: Sensor shield board for FXLS8967AF ultra-low- power motion wakeup sensor for Automotive convenience and security applications.

overview.p: Sensor toolbox development board for FXLS8967AF with enablement software tools.

ul.li: Sensor shield board: FRDM-STBA-A8967 is a sensor add-on/companion shield board for FXLS8967AF 3-axis accelerometer for automotive security and convenience applications
IoT sensing SDK: Provides embedded sensor projects for the demo and custom kits through MCUXpresso
FreeMASTER-Sensor-Tool: Provides out-of-box sensor demo and application development platform for FXLS8967AF
